data.title: CDTFA: Samples of Cannabis – How Does Tax Apply?
data.excerpt: As a distributor, manufacturer, or cultivator, you may sell samples or promotional items to a cannabis retailer.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California department of tax and fee administration
